entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The main location of the story where the events take place.

entities.name: lagers
entities.description: A person who is mentioned as having a hard war and likes the quiet life.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: A person with a horrible temper who had a key to the back door of the riddle house.

entities.name: the cook
entities.description: The cook at the riddle house who is suspicious of Frank.

entities.name: dot
entities.description: A woman in the corner who remembers Frank's horrible temper when he was a kid.

entities.name: the gardener
entities.description: The person who has a spare key to the back door of the riddle house.

relationships.description: Frank and Lagers are mentioned as not wanting to mix.
The cook is suspicious of Frank's actions.
Dot remembers Frank's horrible temper when he was a kid.
